entry.title: The Girl from Paris
entry.summary:
Author: FelicisMagic18873

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,906Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 1,200

Summary: For a second, just a single second, Marinette imagined doing nothing.Imagined standing there with the rest of the class and just watching as blood splattered on the floor, secure in the knowledge that no one could blame her for not stepping in.After all, it wasn't Paris. She wasn't Ladybug, and Lila had been picked randomly from their group to be held at gunpoint.

entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,220Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 186

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: We Should have Stayed in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: skhwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,465Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 8,417

Summary: The students of Gotham Academy were confused. It was International Friendship Week, and it was Gotham’s turn to host. Except no one wanted Gotham to host, not even Gotham! So the Directors of the Friendship Conference decided that it was in everybody’s best interest to skip the City of Crime and go straight to the City of Lights. Everyone thought that it was the perfect idea! Except for Paris. The Gothamites couldn’t help but laugh and scoff at the Parisians insistence that Gotham would be a much safer place than Paris, and nothing should change. And everyone, even one Damian Wayne, was thrilled when the petition went through, and they boarded the plane for Paris.And then…a giant baby…tried to eat the Eiffel Tower…they should have stayed in Gotham.

entry.summary:
Author: SimplyAnotherWriter

entry.title: The Strike Of A Villainess
entry.summary:
Author: SleepyNov

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,807Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 234

Summary: Before she could finally figure out who Hawkmoth is, Marinette is thrown into an otome game of her favorite fandom— the DC Universe! Unfortunately, that’s not all there is to it:1. To get back to her old world, she has to save this one, of course.2. Her kwamis are no where to be found! Not to say she hasn’t found ANY kwamis.3. Everyone but the dc characters seem to be based off of people in her own world, including the person she became…Oh… and did I mention that she’s the villainess? Whoopsie!(Redid the summary and tags because it was bothering me. Hope you all like it better now!)

entry.title: I don't need to see to find you
entry.summary:
Author: Assassinscred

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,698Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 1,774

Summary: Marinette and Damian were raised to be married one day. They were the culmination of two powerful bloodlines. He is the next head of the League of Assassins and she's the next Grand guardian of the miraculous.But great plans never hold up well under first contact with the enemy. With a coup and an acid attack, Marinette finds herself without the boy she grew up with, unable to see the world, and with a new family to teach her how to function without the use of her eyes while waiting to be called back to her betrothed's side.

entry.title: The Love I Need
entry.summary:
Author: reagan_miraculous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,258Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Hey so i hope you enjoy this spinoff from the story “Shes sunshine, she’s grace, she’ll punch you in the face” by Brinxiethebear! this is just my spinoff of what happens after marinette comes back to paris and if this takes place in 2024/2025 and marinette is a competitive dancer! there will be angst when mentioning some akuma attacks (which some i made up) and there will be no smut as i don’t want to write that!please leave comments with tips on how to improve! Marinette is back in Paris but misses Gotham so much, But the part of Gotham she misses is The Wayne’s as they had become such a big part of her life in the past few weeks and she has grown to love them very quickly, While Marinette is back in Paris missing the Wayne’s, The Wayne’s (especially Damian) are also missing Marinette and are starting to plan a surprise visit for over Christmas break. Marinette has suppressed her feelings over her friends leaving her for Lila for a while now but now that they are all friends again she finds herself starting to break. Will she find herself spiraling or will a certain someone be able to help. *Re-named used to be “the aftermath of something new”*

entry.title: Miraculously Living
entry.summary:
Author: Pandoras_VoidHeart

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,587Chapters: 4/8Kudos: 21

Summary: Marinette always had a thing about jumping.In gymnastics when she was younger it took a lot longer than the other girls to do backhand springs. The vault was her sworn enemy throughout her gymnastics career. It was a trust thing. Her head would overthink the motions. Her body wouldn’t follow through and when her run towards the vaulting table came to a head, she’d – well it took a bit longer than she’d like not to just slam into the thing.Now, with red and black across her back the familiar moment of hesitation would hit sometimes. Dark hair blowing with the harsh winds, her torso twisting through the flip as she guided her weight towards the harsh concrete with the familiarity of years of repetition. Extending her arm out with a flourish, yoyo in hand- she hesitated.What if she just didn’t.What if she just didn’t throw out the yoyo and snag her next support.-Honestly I've been in a bit of a dark place mentally and for some reason decided to express that a bit through writing. Not quite sure where this is going but in a sorta depression fueled energy I wrote this story. It's complete just gonna be posting as I edit them.

entry.title: The War of Balance
entry.summary:
Author: NightingaleRose2023

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,043Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 164

Summary: The League of Assassins has declared war against the Order of the Guardians, forcing the Miraculous Court, and their beloved leaders, Marinette and Damian, on a mission, a race against time, to recollect the remaining forgotten and missing miraculi around the globe.However, the aftermath of their previous war has created ripples...and with their current fight leading them far too close to a past life, worlds may collide. After all... The Al Ghul line will do anything to emerge victorious...(This is book two of my series, so for this story to make sense, please read book one before reading this one.)

entry.title: Graceful Shadow (New)
entry.summary:
Author: RavenDragon643

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,088Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 165

Summary: After Marinette's parents had enough of her lying about her bullying Lila, they send her to America to live with Sabine's old college friend, Lois Lane. Lois was happy to take in Marinette and she believed her. Now Marinette is trying to navigate her new life and maybe fall in love with a certain Robin. Will they stop Hawkmoth and Lila?
